title: Fishing on the Diamantina
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Planning and Community Development, partner
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia - Armed forces
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia. Royal Australian Navy
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Naval operations - History
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Veterans - Australia
abstract: "It was fantastic. We saw stuff that nobody had seen before, but what we saw is still classified."
description: Wayne Gwynne joined the Navy in 1960 when he was 17. Spending 5 years at sea, during peacetime, Gwynne got to see things that no one has seen before. While he still can't talk about those things, he loved his time at sea, especially on his favourite ship, the 'Diamantina'.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002683; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [Morwell veterans]; Active; 2011
